job_desc: Job Description; ; • Hands on experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools such as: Talend, Informatica, Apache Beam, Kafka, Apache Airflow, Storm, Spark-Streaming, etc.; • Hands on experience using programming languages like Python, Scala, Java, SQL; • Experience in Big Data Management Frameworks, tools, and solutions especially Cloudera Hadoop, Hive, Impala, HBase, MapReduce, and Tableau; ; Kualifikasi khusus :; - sql; - phyton; - tableau; - bash script linux; - etl airflow; - big query (gcp); ; ; Kualifikasi:; Education : Minimal S1; Department : Sistem Informatika / Teknik Informatika; IPK : Min 2.75; Experience : Minimal 2 years experience in data analytics; ; Kualifikasi umum : pengalaman minimal 2 tahun di bidang pengolahan database

We are looking for Data Engineer to be part of our IT Business Insight and Analytics Team.; Job Description:; Mining data from primary and secondary sources, then reorganizing said data in a format that can be used by next process such as data analytics, data science or any AI/ML processes; Manage day-to-day operation in collecting, storing, processing and analyzing huge sets of data including construct data storages and data-access tools (data lake approach); Monitor overal performance and stability of the system, warehouse cleansing and ensure track pipeline stability; Job Requirements:; Have at least 7-12 years of experience in data lake implementation; Experience on design & setup data lake architecture, topology, and infrastructure; Experience with ETL and ELT data pipeline hands-on & implementation; Proficient with data lake related skills, such as : Cloudera, Dataiku, Object Storage, Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Airflow,Dremio, Python, R, Docker, Kubernetes, Iceberg/HUDI, etc; Good & have passion on data processing; Working location: Serpong

Job Description; Establish data engineering frameworks, standards, and guidelines; Design, develop, and maintain efficient and scalable data pipelines; Optimize pipeline performance to reduce latency and improve efficiency; Build and manage scalable, secure, and reliable data storage systems; Provide technical guidance and support to engineering teams; Promote collaboration among teams involved in data initiatives; Ensure compliance with data privacy, security, retention, and disposal regulations; Qualification; Min 4 years of experience in data engineering; Advanced proficiency in SQL and experience with PostgreSQL, MSSQL, or BigQuery; Hands-on experience with ETL tools such as Pentaho, Apache Airflow, Prefect, or dbt; Proficient in Python programming; Experience with cloud platforms (GCP, AWS, Azure); Solid understanding of data warehousing and data modelling concepts; Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail; Proven experience in leading and managing a team.; Key Competencies:; SQL; ETL (Extract-Transform-Load); Database and Data Warehouse; Programming Languages (Python, Java, Scala); Cloud Technologies (GCP, AWS, Azure); Data Modelling; BI Tools (Tableau, Power BI)

Job Description; Core Banking Migration: Participating in the migration of core banking systems.; Reconciliation of Core Banking Migration Results: Ensuring the accuracy and consistency of data after core banking migrations.; ETL DWH Migration: Assisting with the migration of ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes for the Data Warehouse.; Regulator Report: Contributing to the generation of reports required by regulators.; Transaction Reconciliation: Performing reconciliation of transactions.; Code Analysis and Workflow Design: Being able to analyze problems and read code, as well as designing workflows using flowcharts.; ETL Tools and Database Understanding: Mastering ETL tools and demonstrating a strong understanding of databases.; Programming: Applying knowledge of one or more programming languages.; Job Qualifications; Education: Minimum D3 (Diploma Three), preferably S1 (Bachelor's degree), or equivalent from any major with experience in the IT field.; Work Experience: Minimum 1 - 5 years of experience in the relevant field.; General Knowledge: Understanding of general banking flow.; Ability to analyze problems and read code.; Ability to design workflows using flowcharts.; Technical Skills (Skillset): Databases and Data Management: Proficiency in SQL, Data Warehouse concepts, MySQL/Postgres/MS SQL, Oracle, DB2, and Big Data technologies.; ETL Tools: Mastery of ETL tools such as ODI, IBM DataStage, Talend, or Pentaho.; Programming Languages: Knowledge of one or more programming languages, with PHP specifically mentioned.; Other Technologies: Familiarity with SOA, ISO 8583, SOAP Web Service, and API.

Job Description:; To analyze and validate data source readiness and integrity; To build and organize a data pipeline (ETL/ELT) procedure for usage in a data warehouse environment; Routine work of monitoring and troubleshooting data processing performance; To identify potential problems and create solutions for more robust and efficient data processing; To assess and implement new cloud technology and big data platforms; Requirements :; A Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or relevant disciplines from a top university; Minimum 1 year of working experience as a Data Engineer or ETL Developer; Strong analytical skills & high sense of logical thinking; Experience developing data warehouse schemas with OWB, ODI, or other enterprise ETL technologies; Have expertise and experience with a cloud solution, preferably a GCP Platform.; Willing to work onsite & fulltime in Bintaro, Tangerang Selatan

Responsibilities :; Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture; Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.; Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.;  Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and On-prem/ Cloud technologies.; Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics; Qualifications :; 2-4 years of experience as a data engineer.; Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.; ETL tools knowledge is required.; Experience building and optimizing big data pipelines, architectures and data sets.; Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.;  Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.; Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.; A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.

Job Description; Design and implement scalable data pipeline using modern data platform (Spark, Flink, Kafka, Airflow); Build and manage ETL/ELT processes to ingest data from various sources (databases, APIs, files, message queues); Develop and maintain data models and data warehouse / datalake architectures; Ensure high data quslity and implement data validation, observability and monitoring frameworks; Collaborate with other team such as data analyst, data scientist and business stakeholders to understand data requirements and deliver data solutions; Optimize performance of big data processing jobs and ensure cost efficiencient data infrastructure; Advocate for best practices in data engineering, including documentation, testing, version control and other with team; Minimum Qualifications; Bachelor degree from Computer Science or Informatic Engineering; Min. 3 years experience as Data Engineer or similar role; Strong proficiency in SQL and programming language (Python, Java or Scala); Hands on with distributed data processing framework (Apache Spark, Kafka, Flink); Solid understanding of data modelling, data warehouse and query performance optimization; Experience with cloud platform such as Alibaba Cloud, AWS, GCP or Azure; Familiarity with modern orchestration tools like Apache AirFlow or other; Experience with CI/CD and DevOps practices in data engineering

Job Description; 1. Designing, developing, and maintaining data pipelines for ETL processes and orchestration workflows.; 2. Creating and managing data visualization dashboards to support business decision-making.; 3. Performing data cleansing and validation to ensure data quality and reliability.; 4. Developing and maintaining simple web applications to facilitate data input processes.; 5. Collaborating closely with other IT teams to ensure integrated and complementary system solutions.; Job Qualifications; 1. Minimum Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Data Engineering, or a related field.; 2. At least 2 years of experience in a similar role, preferably in data engineering or a related domain.; 3. Proficient in core Data Engineering technologies such as Apache Airflow, SQL, and Python.; 4. Strong understanding and hands-on experience with ETL processes and data orchestration.; 5. Excellent communication skills, with a proactive and collaborative work attitude.; 6. Willing to travel and work in different locations.; 7. Placement in Tebet, South Jakarta.

Business Function; DBSI T&O is the backbone that supports the bank as the central of operations and technology. With the spirit of OneTeam and PRIDE! Value, we serve Institutional Banking Operations and Consumer Banking Operations, manage Customer Centre and IT, provide Group Procurement and Corporate Real Estate, coordinate bank-wide Business Continuity Management program and framework, and deliver service quality for Digibank and IBG/GTS. Our Technology & Operations organization is a vital strategic partner to the business in providing competitive advantage that propels DBSI towards being the Best Bank for a Better World (#B3W).; Responsibilities; Collaborate with regional team, business unit, support unit and other related party for any projects.; Ensure user requirements on data needs are captured; Develop scripts/tools to support data requirements and ingestion from BU/SU; Maintain good relationships between IT and business, manage business expectations and negotiate compromise; Requirements; Minimum 4 years of relevant working experience; Understand key data concepts, develop data set processes, techniques and considerations in Machine learning and Data analytics; Training and relevant experience in one or more of the following areas \:; Statistical modelling tools such as\: R, Python, SAS, etc; Data manipulation using scripting languages like Python or using ETL tools; Visual analytics technologies like Tableau, Qlikview, PowerBI, etc; End-to-end analytics architecture, preferably with some working knowledge of big data stack; Passion towards automation where appropriate and beneficial; Unix Shell Scripting and knowledge of Job scheduler; Excellent understanding of technology life cycles and the concepts and practices required to build big data solutions; Ability to understand and build re-usable data assets or features to enable downstream data science models to read and use

Requirements:; Minimum 1 year of experience as a Data Engineer.; Proven experience with ETL tool setup and usage, especially Informatica; Talend is a plus.; Experience in building and maintaining data warehouses.; Solid understanding of ELT/ETL concepts, data integration, and data modeling.; Hands-on experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, Alibaba Cloud, etc.; Strong skills in SQL and relational databases.; Self-driven with good problem-solving skills and the ability to work both independently and in a team environment.; Willing to work in 24x7 rotating shifts including weekends and holidays.; Job desc:; Install, configure, and maintain ETL tools, primarily Informatica (preferred) or Talend.; Design and develop scalable ELT/ETL pipelines to support data integration and transformation.; Build and manage data warehouse infrastructure and architecture.; Monitor and optimize data pipeline performance and reliability.; Collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, and business teams to deliver efficient data solutions.; Document data architectures, pipelines, and processes.

About the Role As Sr. Data Engineer for our global Data Enrichment squad, you will be responsible for implementing data flows using Apache Airflow and AWS, incorporating functionalities such as external API’s, AI/ML components, and GenAI. You will work in close collaboration with your ETL Lead and Product Owner to translate the requirements of our customers and stakeholders to ETL data flow features and then build and run them. You improve the operations of the ETL data flows by improving our monitoring capabilities, automated error recovery, and scalability.; Responsibilities:; ● Develop and maintain ETL workflows using Apache Airflow and AWS services.; ● Take ownership of complex ETL tasks and AWS Lambda functions.; ● Design ETL pipelines and review work from junior team members.; ● Contribute to building secure and scalable data solutions.; ● Operate and monitor data flows in production environments, supporting junior colleagues as needed.; ● Improve the resilience, reliability, and performance of ETL systems.; ● Automate recurring operations and optimize performance.; ● Guide junior team members in testing practices and setting up automated tests.; ● Promote and model best practices for documentation across the team.; Requirements:; ● 5+ years of experience as a full-time Data Engineer; ● Hands-on experience delivering projects using Apache Airflow in the past 2 years.; ● Proficiency with AWS; ● Experience with PostgreSQL and/or OpenSearch.; ● Strong SQL skills demonstrated through past roles and projects.; ● Experience implementing and improving CI/CD pipelines for ETL processes.; ● Solid understanding and several years of experience working with Python in a production environment.

Responsibilities :; Design, build, and maintain the company’s source of truth (data lake, data warehouse, and data mart), dashboarding/reporting platforms, and/or any other data products; Work closely with BI analysts and data scientists to implement a variety of descriptive and predictive analytic solutions; Work closely with the product and engineering team to ensure the data ecosystem quality and accountability; Requirements :; Candidate must possess at least bachelor degree in Computer Science or Information Technology; At least 1-2 years of experience as data engineer (have experience data science course online school); Proficient with a variety of data engineering ETL Tools (Pentaho, Talend, SSIS, etc); Good understanding of the basics of data pipeline, and experience in implementing data-lake/data-warehouse/data-mart, with most recent data tech-stacks; Firm grasp in SQL Queries.

About the role; As one of the prominent fintech players in Indonesia, Amartha provides financial services to underbanked women entrepreneurs in rural areas. We firmly believe that financial inclusion is key to building a sustainable economy that uplifts and supports the entire country.; We are currently seeking a Junior Data Scientist to join our team. In this role, you will apply your skills in data wrangling and advanced problem-solving to tackle real business challenges. You will collaborate with a diverse range of stakeholders, including business experts, product leaders, and tech-savvy engineers.; You’ll also work alongside a team of exceptional data scientists with varied expertise, spanning data engineering, machine learning and AI engineering, data warehousing, and data analysis.; At Amartha, we value your mindset and adaptability even more than your technical prowess.; Responsibilities; Develop and maintain data engineering services as a part of the big data ecosystem in Amartha; Develop data engineering framework to simplify the day-to-day data science works; Collaborate with the data science, product, and engineering teams to build a product solution with integrated analytics and/or machine learning systems; Research the latest data and ML/AI engineering tools and frameworks that can potentially be implemented to improve the status quo; Influencing the data-driven culture to the company; Requirements; A Bachelor’s / Master's degree in engineering or quantitative fields; Proficient in setting up basic networking in a cloud system; Proficient in DevOps best practices such as CI/CD or IAC; Proven expertise in using Docker and Kubernetes; Familiar with common data engineering tools (Airflow, dbt, Spark, etc.); Previous experience in implementing end-to-end machine learning in production is a plus; Previous experience in building scalable real-time analytical solutions is a plus; Proficient in tackling ambiguous problems with clarity and a structured framework; Ability to simplify and clearly communicate complex concepts to non-technical persons; Ability to seamlessly and effectively communicate from strategic to operational levels; Strong resolve in facing uncertainties and new challenges; At Amartha, we are dedicated to creating a workplace that celebrates diversity, ensures equity, and fosters inclusion. We believe that diverse perspectives—shaped by factors such as gender, age, race, ethnicity, education, culture, and life experiences—drive innovation and growth.; We actively welcome individuals from all backgrounds to join us in building an environment where everyone feels respected, valued, and empowered. Our commitment is to provide equal opportunities and foster a sense of belonging that enables our employees to thrive and make meaningful contributions.

Join our team as an IT Data Engineer Specialist and play a critical role in designing, optimizing, and maintaining our data transformation and warehousing processes. If you’re passionate about data, performance, and collaboration, this role is for you.; Key Responsibilities:; Design, develop, and maintain data transformation processes to cleanse, transform, and aggregate data within the data warehouse.; Optimize and streamline data workflows to ensure efficient processing and storage.; Collaborate with data analysts and business stakeholders to understand data requirements and implement the right data transformations.; Develop and maintain database schemas, tables, and views to support reporting and analytics needs.; Implement data governance policies to ensure data quality, security, and compliance.; Monitor and maintain system performance, troubleshoot issues, and optimize scalability and efficiency in the data warehouse and data pipelines.; Qualifications:; Minimum 3 years of experience in data engineering or a related field.; Strong understanding of data transformation and warehousing concepts and have skill about Python, Bash Linux, SQL Server, PostgresSQL, Docker, Apache Airflow; Familiarity with data governance and security best practices.; Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.

Job Description:; - Design, build, and optimize machine learning models for real-world applications; - Hands-on coding: Write clean, efficient, and scalable code for AI pipelines and deployments.; - Translate business problems into AI solutions, from prototype to production.; - Implement and integrate AI models into business systems using cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) or on-premise.; - Work with structured/unstructured data, develop pipelines, and ensure data readiness for AI applications.; - Work with cross-functional teams, including business leaders, product managers, and engineers, to ensure AI solutions align with business needs.; Requirement:; - Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field; - Preferably 2+ years of experience in same position; - experience in AI/ML engineering, data science, or related fields.; - Strong proficiency in Python (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn) and SQL.; - Experience with MLOps (model monitoring, deployment, scaling).; - Familiarity with cloud services (AWS/GCP/Azure) and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).; - Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently.; - Excellent communication skills to translate AI concepts into business impact.; - Experience in Generative AI, NLP, or Computer Vision.; - Exposure to LLMs (Large Language Models) and fine-tuning techniques.; - Understanding of software engineering best practices (CI/CD, version control, API development).

Requirement :; Have a Diploma or Bachelor degree in Computer Engineering, Informatics Engineering, Computer Science, mathematics, statistics or other related degrees; Having minimum >2 years experiences in using Talend Data Management or Talend Big Data Management; Having deep understanding in ETL and Data Warehousing Concept (fact, dimension, star schema / snowflake schema, SCD) and development flow; Having good communication skills; Able to work under minimum supervision; Experience using ETL tools (Talend, Airflow, etc.); Experience using relational databases (PostgreSQL, mySQL, etc.); Willing to handle Project Finance; Full WFO at Jakarta

Job Descriptions:; Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture for report, business intelligence (BI) dashboard.; Create report and business intelligence (BI) dashboard need by organization.; Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery that needed by BI and reporting services; Create the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and big data technologies.; Create analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency, and other key business performance metrics.; Create data tools for analytics in building and optimizing reporting services.; Ensure the effectiveness and efficiency of operational database system.; Monitor database & system operational activities in Bina Nusantara.; Maintain data security and accuracy in Bina Nusantara; Provide excellent service towards users, in relation to database authorization, change and withdrawal (web & workgroup); ; Requirements :; Minimum Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related field; Had experience 2 years as Data Analyst or related field is a plus; Understanding of structured query language (SQL); Demonstrated experience with BI Tools (Tableau, Power BI, OBIEE, Qlikview).; Experience interpreting data and analyzing results using statistical techniques; Experience presenting findings to business partners across the organization, including executive leadership; Experience with database software/web applications; Strong analytical and organisational skills; Ability to work well in a fast paced environment, where the technology is constantly changing

Role: Lead Data Scientist - Big Data and Modelling
job_desc: Company Description; Indodana Fintech is an OJK-licensed financial technology company that operates a credit marketplace for peer-to-peer loans. Our mission is to achieve financial inclusion by enabling lenders to provide loans to the 100 million underbanked Indonesians. Leveraging sophisticated big data and artificial intelligence technologies, we connect hundreds of lenders with creditworthy borrowers every day.; Our team hailed from Silicon Valley Tech companies such as Google, Microsoft, LinkedIn and Sofi as well as Indonesian startups such as Doku, Touchten. We have graduates from well known universities such as Universitas Indonesia, ITB, Stanford, University of Washington, Cornell and many others. We are building a company with the same culture of openness, transparency, drive and meritocracy as Silicon Valley companies. Join us in our cause to build a world class fintech company in Indonesia.; Job Description; Lead the design, development, and deployment of machine learning models for risk scoring, fraud detection, and behavioural analytics; Drive feature engineering, model training, and model monitoring pipelines using large-scale datasets; Build and maintain a scalable data infrastructure in collaboration with the Data Engineering team; Manage and mentor a team of data scientists and engineers, ensuring high standards in model accuracy, interpretability, and governance; Translate complex business problems into data-driven solutions and communicate technical insights clearly to stakeholders; Lead model validation, backtesting, and performance analysis for new and existing models; Develop and implement data quality checks, pipelines, and data governance protocols; Qualifications; Bachelor’s or Master’s in Data Science, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, or related field; 3+ years of experience in data science, machine learning, or risk modeling, ideally in fintech or banking; Strong command of Python, SQL, and big data tools (e.g., Spark, Airflow, Hadoop, AWS/GCP/Databricks); Experience leading end-to-end model development in production environments; Solid understanding of credit risk, fraud analytics, or financial modelling

Job Description; Bertanggung jawab dalam membangun dan memelihara sistem data-platform, mulai dari tahapan proses pengumpulan data dari berbagai data-source (extract), data-cleansing (data quality) dan data transformasi (transform). Data-Platform sebagai tools memberikan insight kepada pengguna dalam melakukan pengambilan keputusan operasional maupun keputusan strategi.; Mengekstrak, mengubah, dan memuat (ETL) data dari berbagai sumber termasuk basis data, API, dan berkas log; Menerapkan pemeriksaan kualitas data dan sistem pemantauan untuk memastikan keakuratan dan konsistensi data; Mengembangkan dan memelihara model data dan data warehouse; Berkolaborasi dengan business-analyst untuk memahami kebutuhan data mereka dan menerjemahkannya menjadi technical-specification; Menganalisa dan melakukan perubahaan terhadap sistem data-platform untuk perbaikan system-error, pemeliharaan dan pengembangan; Menjaga kualitas sistem yang dihasilkan dengan mempertimbangkan user-friend, user-experience, speed performance dan system reliability; Melakukan test terhadap hasil pengembangan/pemeliharaan; Bertanggung jawab atas pengembangan dan pemeliharaan peranti lunak sesuai dengan objektif perusahaan dan kebutuhan pengguna; Qualification:; Berpengalaman min. 2 tahun bekerja sebagai ETL Developer mengembangkan memelihara dan mengelola RDBMS termasuk pembuatan script, store-procedure dan SQL Query; Membuat dan memelihara data pipeline architecture yang optimal untuk integrasi data menggunakan ETL tools seperti SSIS, Pentaho dan Talend; Build data ingestion workflow for data warehouse/data marts/operational data store7; Pengetahuan dan pengalaman terhadap data-warehouse, data-marts, operational-data-store dan master data management; Pengetahuan dan pengalaman dalam database-design dan membangun database; Pengetahuan dan pengalaman dalam pembuatan SQL script dan tuning SQL yang baik

At Catalyst, People are the heartbeat of our company. We believe that good quality people will have a positive impact on our business. We are looking for a skilled Data Engineer to join our growing team. If you are passionate about being part of the team, building some of the most critical products, and Working alongside teams in the industry across product, engineering, and design, Let’s join us!; ; Job Description:; Develop data models and maintain company metrics and dashboard.; Develop and maintain ETL data pipelines.; Do automate testing to ensure data quality.; Translates complex functional and technical requirements into detailed design and high performing data applications.; Research or explore any new technologies to complement or improve requirements and current technologies.; Collaborate with management, business partners, analysts, developers, architects, and engineers to support data quality efforts.; ; Requirements:; Possess at least 2 years of experience in Data Engineering. Experienced working in e-commerce or marketplace is preferred.; Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, IT, Mathematics or related field.; Strong proficiency in Python, R, and SQL.; Strong data modeling knowledge.; Strong foundation in Data Query/Manipulation.; Have experience managing and designing data pipelines, debugging data issues.; Experienced in DBT (Data Build Tools) and Snowflake.; Experience working with complex ETL and Data warehouse will be a bonus.

About the Role - In today's data-driven world, effective data engineering plays a crucial role in enabling businesses to make informed decisions. As a data engineer, you will be responsible for gathering business requirements, integrating data sources, and designing scalable data models to support business intelligence (BI) initiatives. Your role will also involve developing data quality frameworks, optimizing data pipelines, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to resolve data-related challenges. To succeed in this role, you will need a strong foundation in SQL, data modeling, and big data technologies, along with experience in cloud platforms and a keen eye for problem-solving and collaboration.; About GoTo Group; GoTo Group is the largest digital ecosystem in Indonesia with its mission to “Empower Progress’ by offering technological infrastructure and solutions for everyone to access and thrive in the digital economy. The GoTo ecosystem consists of on-demand transportation services, food and grocery delivery, logistics and fulfillment, as well as financial and payment services through the Gojek and GoTo Financial platforms.It is the first platform in Southeast Asia that hosts these crucial cases in a single ecosystem, capturing the majority of Indonesia’s vast consumer household.; About Gojek ; Gojek is Southeast Asia’s leading on-demand platform and pioneer of the multi-service ecosystem with over 2.5 million driver partners across the regions offering a wide range of services such as transportation, food delivery, logistics and more. With its mission to create impact at scale, Gojek is committed to resolving consumer problems and raising standards of living by connecting consumers to the best providers of goods and services in the market.; About GoTo Financial; GoTo Financial accelerates financial inclusion through its leading financial services and merchants solutions. Its consumer services include GoPay and GoPayLater and serve businesses of all sizes through Midtrans, Moka, GoBiz Plus, GoBiz, and Selly. With its trusted and inclusive ecosystem of products, GoTo Financial is open to new growth opportunities and aims to empower everyone to Make It Happen, Make It Together, Make It Last.; GoTo and its business units, including Gojek and GoToFinancial ("GoTo") only post job opportunities on our official channels on our respective company websites and on LinkedIn. GoTo is not liable for any job postings or job offers that did not originate from us. You should conduct your own due diligence to prevent being victims of any fake job scams, if they did not originate from GoTo's official recruitment channels.

Role: Alibaba Cloud-Product Solution Architect (Big Data & AI)-Jakarta, Indonesia
job_desc: Computing Platform BU is the core Big Data and AI product division of Alibaba Cloud. The department provides customers with Big Data and AI product capabilities to help them build industry-leading, stable and reliable big data analysis platforms, cloud-native data warehouses, data lakehouse, and AI large-scale model training and inference platforms, meeting customer demands in big data and AI analytics scenarios. By joining Alibaba Cloud's Computing Platform BU, you'll gain exposure to world-class Big Data and AI products and cutting-edge technology, serve leading global clients across different countries, and assist customers in better journey to Alibaba Cloud.; 1. Lead the development and standardization of big data and AI product solutions, responsible for the full process solution support from pre-sale to delivery.; 2. Familiar with and understand typical industry big data & AI solutions, extract typical product scenarios for industry-specific big data & AI, and summarize and promote industry strategies and solutions.; 3. Based on Alibaba Cloud's big data & AI product capabilities, assist clients with product deployment and implementation, solving issues encountered in customer big data scenarios through various big data industry solutions.; 4. Responsible for producing overall solution architecture design documents, managing changes to the overall technical solution, and designing new solutions based on customer needs identified during operations.; 5. Collaborate with business, product R&D, and delivery teams to advance benchmark customers and act as the person responsible for the competitiveness of product solutions, influencing key decisions of industry companies.; 6. Enable and support Alibaba Cloud's business team in gaining market share and be responsible for the growth of the products.; 7. Identify and provide feedback on common industry needs, promote the enhancement of cloud product big data & AI capabilities, and create competitive big data & AI products in the industry.; ; 1. Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Information Technology, or related fields (with solid fundamentals in statistics, machine learning, modeling, and data analysis and mining), preferably at the undergraduate level or above, with relevant experience in big data in the industry.; 2. Over 5 years of relevant work experience in enterprise-level big data product development, product commercialization, and pre-sales management, with comprehensive oversight abilities in product decision-making, execution, and vision planning aimed at customers, promoting the application of Alibaba Cloud big data products. Experience in cloud vendors within the internet industry is preferred.; 3. Relevant industry data application capabilities, with practical experience in the implementation of big data applications in specific sectors, able to explore detailed business scenarios for big data applications and drive the amplification of industry data value.; 4. Strong business collaboration abilities, with good team communication and collaborative skills to facilitate the smooth advancement and delivery of large projects involving multiple businesses and roles, leading the team to achieve results.; 5. Experience in relevant projects related to data warehousing, data modeling, and data governance, proficient in at least one distributed computing framework such as Hadoop, Spark, or Flink, with an understanding of their architecture and working principles.; 6. Experience with practical cases of data analysis/algorithm application, with complete project experience in goal-oriented modeling and model effectiveness verification preferred.; 7. Familiarity with mainstream big data products in the industry, such as AWS Redshift, GCP BigQuery, Databricks, and Huawei Fusion Insight, among core competitors is preferred.; 8. Must possess good communication skills, with strong English communication abilities to engage effectively with international client.

We are seeking a talented Big Data Engineer with expertise in Python, Big Data Environment, and PostgreSQL/ClickHouse to join our team. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining data pipelines, processing systems, and data warehousing solutions that power our analytics and business intelligence applications.; Qualifications:; 1+ years of experience in software development, with a focus on data engineering and big data technologies.; Proficiency in SQL and experience with PostgreSQL/ ClickHouse.; Comfortable with Unix-like OS.; Familiar with Bash/Shell Scripting.; Strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and database design.; Information:; Full Remote, but must be willing to attend on-site coordination meetings if required.; Office location: Mampang Prapatan, Jakarta.

Qualification :; Degree in Computer Science, Electrical/Computer Engineering, Industrial & System Engineering, Mathematics/Statistics; Proficient in Pythons and one or more of the following programming languages: R, Scala, Java, C++; Strong working knowledge of SQL and all function on the SQL and good logic to make efficient query structure. And have knowledge with all data structures and types.; Also handling big data processing with efficient and best performance.; Have experience with Unix/ubuntu, Hadoop, Impala and Hive. Have experience with google cloud platform especially composer, bigquery, storage, Vertex AI, cloud function/run, etc.; Min 3 Years’ Experience as DS, DE, or Data Analyst Have Experience in Industry: Telco / iOT / BFSI; Responsibility :; Design, implement, and operationalize data pipelines to extract and load data from various sources (databases, APIs, logs, etc.) and make the pipelines works efficient.; As a core member of the Data team, attend daily standup to update status on Data development activities, also perform the following activities.; Coordinate with IT/Network Team and IoH Data Management and Quality Team to make sure all the data integrity and quality. Check data for errors and fix any issues to maintain its accessibility and reliability.; Improve the efficiency and speed of data processing to make it faster.; Create rules for data management to ensure appropriate and ethical usage. Stay updated on data privacy laws (like GDPR, CCPA) and ensure compliance. Record data history and characteristics for improved understanding and traceability. 094/Q0M-Q0MA/STR/2025; Help design data systems, thinking about data structures and future growth. Work together with data scientists and analysts to support their data infrastructure needs.; Establish and manage data storage solutions, encompassing both SQL and NoSQL databases as well as data warehouses. Improve data storage efficiency, scalability, and cost-effectiveness. Implement stringent data security measures and access controls to safeguard sensitive information.; To make telco data such mobility, online behavior, communication pattern to be a relevant consideration of other industries decision making such as banking, ecommerce, retail, and government institutions; Monitoring for Data Quality and fixing the data if there are some issues.

Job Descriptions:; You will be responsible for managing data flow, building data pipelines, and ensuring data is available in an optimal format for analysis. We rely on you to build reliable and scalable data solutions. In this role, you must have a strong understanding of data architecture, big data technology, and software engineering practices. Your goal is to help our company manage and utilize data effectively for better decision making.; Job Qualifications:; Bachelor's Degree (S1) in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related fields.; Proven experience as a Data Engineer.; Experience in building and managing data pipelines (ETL/ELT).; Strong understanding of data architecture and big data technology.; Strong skills in SQL and Python.; Experience with big data tools and frameworks (for example, Spark, Hadoop, Kafka).; Experience with data warehouse and data lake (for example, Redshift, BigQuery, Snowflake).; Strong problem-solving skills. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.; Key Responsibilities:; Building and maintaining a scalable and reliable data infrastructure.; Develop and manage data pipelines (ETL/ELT) to integrate data from various sources.; Optimize data system performance and ensure data availability.; Build and maintain data warehouse.; Automate data process and increase efficiency.; Monitor and solve problems related to data and data infrastructure.; Maintain clear and detailed documentation of data architecture, data pipeline, and data process.; Preferred Skills:; Expertise in using containerization tools (for example, Docker, Kubernetes).; Advanced knowledge of database security, backup and recovery, and performance monitoring standards.; Experience with implementing CI/CD for data pipeline.

Responsibilities:; Design, build, and maintain scalable and efficient data pipelines to collect, process, and store data from various sources; Work with cloud-based technologies (GCP) to manage and process large datasets; Develop and maintain data warehousing solutions for efficient data storage and retrieval; Ensure data security and compliance with relevant data protection regulations; Monitor and troubleshoot data pipeline issues to ensure smooth data flow; Qualifications:; Proficiency in programming languages such as Python and SQL; Experience with data warehousing solutions such as BigQuery; Familiarity with ELT (Extract, Load, Transform) processes and tools is a plus; Knowledge of cloud platforms and services for data storage and processing; Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail; Good communication and teamwork abilities

Job Description; Design, build, and maintain robust and scalable data pipelines (ETL/ELT) using modern tools and technologies.; Integrate data from internal and external sources, ensuring data integrity and reliability.; Work closely with data scientists, analysts, and business teams to understand data needs and deliver efficient solutions.; Develop and maintain data models and data warehouses/lakes to support business intelligence and analytics.; Optimize data systems for performance, scalability, and cost efficiency.; Implement data quality checks, monitoring, and alerting systems.; Ensure data privacy, security, and compliance with regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).; Document data pipelines, architecture, and processes clearly and consistently.; Minimum Qualifications; 3+ years of experience in a Data Engineer or similar data-centric role.; Strong experience with SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) for ETL development, deployment, and maintenance.; Proven ability to design, build, and manage ETL pipelines using SSIS.; Hands-on experience with Power BI for building reports, dashboards, and data visualizations.; Solid knowledge of T-SQL and working with SQL Server databases.; Understanding of data quality, data governance, and data lineage concepts.; Familiarity with performance tuning and optimization of ETL processes and SQL queries.

Design datawarehouse dan datamart modelling (banking); 3. Dokumentasi FSD, Implan; 4. Analisa data dari bank regulatory (OJK,BI), external dan internal source system

What is Shipper:; Shipper is Indonesia's leading digital logistics company, specializing in end-to-end supply chain solutions for e-commerce businesses and enterprises. Established in 2017, Shipper is on a mission to democratize top-tier logistics across Indonesia. We are backed by prominent investors, including Naspers, Floodgate, Y-Combinator, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Insignia Ventures Partners, DST Global Partners, and Sequoia Capital India.; ; About The Role: ; We’re on the lookout for a Data Engineer (or Data Analyst Engineer) to join our growing tech team. You’ll play a key role in building our data pipeline from scratch, ensuring data flows smoothly across systems to support real-time operations and critical business decisions. This isn’t just about ETL — we need someone who can design, build, and scale. If you've ever walked into a company with no data infra and built something others could rely on, we’d love to hear from you.; Tech Stack You’ll Work With:; BigQuery, Google Cloud Storage, AWS S3; Apache Airflow, Database Migration Service (DMS); Databricks, Python; Familiarity with datalake architectures and storage optimization; Optional nice-to-have: Kafka, dbt, PostgreSQL, MongoDB; ; What Will You Do:; Build and maintain scalable data pipelines to support both batch and near real-time needs.; Integrate data from operational systems into our BigQuery warehouse.; Set up workflows and scheduling using Airflow.; Handle database replication and transformation via DMS.; Use Databricks for large-scale data processing.; Manage and optimize data storage layers, including AWS S3, GCS, and datalake environments.; Collaborate with engineers, analysts, and product teams to understand and fulfill data needs; What Are The Requirements:; 5+ years of experience in Data Engineering or similar roles.; Hands-on experience building pipelines from scratch.; Strong grasp of cloud-based data platforms, especially GCP and AWS.; Proficient in Python for automation and transformation tasks.; Able to work independently and provide direction in a fast-moving environment

Job Description; Develop ETL/ELT pipelines using tools like AWS Glue, Airflow, or DBT.; Integrate data from APIs, databases, files, and streams into data lakes or warehouses.; Deliver analytics- ready datasets with strong SQL and schema design (Star/Snowflake).; Maintain data quality using validation tools such as Great Expectations or Collibra.; Optimize infrastructure with Redshift, BigQuery. Athena, and partitioning techniques.; Apply data security and compliance practices (IAM, encryption, masking).; Minimum Qualifications; Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems (Is). Informatics Engineering, Mathematics, or a related field.; Minimum 2 to 3 years of experience as a Data Engineer, particularly in building data pipelines and integrations in cloud environments.; Strong understanding of cloud-based data architecture and modern ETL/ELT processes.; Proficient in SQL and familiar with data modeling and schema design.; Excellent problem-solving, communication, and collaboration skills.; Ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams and fast-paced environments.

- SSIS, SQL Server; - Berpengalaman dengan Inner Join, Left & Right, Cross Join, Delete, Turncate, Drop Table, Execution Plan; - Bahasa pemograman, Framework : C#, .Net, Java; - Bersedia onsite WFO di project CIMB Niaga Bintaro

As a Cloud Data Engineer, you will responsible for expanding and optimizing data and pipeline architectures, and for enhancing data collection and flow across functional teams.; We are looking someone with:; A bachelor’s degree in Information Technology or similar field is preferred; Knowledge and proven track record experience with Cloud Data Warehouse technologies; Experience in data engineering and cloud data processing services (AWS, GCP or Azure); Experience building, cloud data migration and optimizing cloud big data data pipelines, architectures, and data sets; Good understanding of ETL tools and experience in Big Data technologies (Hadoop, Spark, Data Bricks, Snowflake); The work you’ll do:; Work along-side customers to delivery data warehouse migrations leveraging best-in-breed technology tooling; Design and build cloud data driven solutions for enterprise data warehouse and data lakes; Develop scalable and easy to understand data pipelines and data management integration solutions; Research, test and measure different optimization techniques, new technologies (e.g. data streaming) and advanced features of existing technologies (e.g. data warehouse configuration) aimed at speeding up data pipelines; What Cybertrend can offer you:; The unique opportunity to work within data science and artificial intelligence solution for various industries – real world data science, AI , Data Management and Governance experiences; Investment in your personal growth and skill development (clear career paths, mentorship and coaching, learning development, etc); Attractive compensation and benefits packages; An open-minded culture with innovative, autonomous teams; A clear set of company core values that guide everything we do: GROWTH mindset, SOLUTION oriented, INNOVATIVE achiever, COMPASSIONATE, GOTONG ROYONG and Cool & FUN

Mengembangkan dan memelihara alur data & proses ETL.; Bekerja sama dengan tim Business Analyst untuk merancang solusi data skalabel.; Memastikan kualitas, integritas, dan konsistensi data.; Mengoptimalkan kinerja database dan query.; Melakukan riset tentang teknologi data terbaru.; Kualifikasi:; Lulusan Sarjana di bidang TI/Ilmu Komputer.; Pengalaman kerja minimal 2 tahun sebagai Data Engineer, dengan pengalaman di industri keuangan diutamakan.; Menguasai SQL dengan kemampuan query, Python, serta ETL tools (seperti Pentaho, Talend, atau lainnya).; Mampu menggunakan BI tools (seperti Cognos, Tableau, atau lainnya); pengalaman dengan BI tools merupakan nilai tambah.; Mampu berbahasa Inggris, terutama dalam membaca dan menulis.; Memahami proses pelaporan regulasi perbankan Indonesia.; Mampu bekerja baik secara tim maupun mandiri.

Are you a passionate data engineer ready to build the infrastructure that powers our insights and decisions? As a Data Engineer, you’ll transform messy, unstructured data into clean, structured datasets, craft pipelines that scale, and support cutting-edge AI and analytics. We’re looking for a dynamic team player to join us in turning data into actionable intelligence! ; 🔍 What You’ll Do:; Design, build, and maintain robust data pipelines across a range of internal systems and products.; Ingest, normalize, and structure large-scale data — from text and PDFs to audio, video, and web-scraped content.; Build scalable data infrastructure for AI model training, chatbot pipelines, and real-time monitoring.; Develop ETL/ELT frameworks supporting real-time dashboards, background tasks, and scheduled analytics.; Ensure data validation, logging, audit trails, and error reporting for QA & Compliance.; 💡 Who We Need:; Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field.; Minimum of 2 years in a similar role.; Experienced in E2E ETL processes for structured & unstructured data.; Experienced in building pipelines with Apache Airflow, Kafka, Spark, or similar.; Experienced in Web scraping with Selenium & proxies.; A self-driven, team player who thrives in a dynamic environment.; Excellent communication skills and a passion for solving problems.; Adaptive, proactive, and ready to take initiative.; 💻 Technical Skills Needed:; Programming: Python, Golang, Java; Databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch for data warehousing and indexing; Strong understanding in REST APIs, web scraping, and asynchronous job queues (Celery, etc.).; Familiarity with cloud storage (GCP, AWS, Azure) and CI/CD pipelines (GitLab CI, BigQuery, S3/Glue, Azure Data Factory).; Tools: ELK, Grafana, MongoDB.; If you meet these requirements and you are looking for a new, exciting opportunity within a successful, growing company, then this role is for you!; Integrity Indonesia is an equal opportunity employer.; * * *; Integrity Indonesia is a foreign investment company that has operated since 2001 in Indonesia, and with established affiliates in Malaysia and Thailand. Our business is to provide services related to the Prevention, Detection, and Investigation of risk.; As a rapidly expanding company with a robust business plan, Integrity Indonesia is looking for self-motivated and results-oriented individuals with solid qualifications who enjoy the challenge to grow and succeed.

Job Description; Design, develop, and maintain data transformation processes to cleanse, transform, and aggregate data within the data warehouse.; Optimize and streamline data workflows to ensure efficient data processing and storage in the data warehouse.; Collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, and business stakeholders to understand data requirements and implement appropriate data transformations.; Develop and maintain data warehouse schemas, tables, and views to support reporting and analytics needs.; Implement data governance policies and standards to ensure data quality, security, and compliance.; Monitor data warehouse performance, troubleshoot issues, and optimize for scalability and efficiency.; Requirement; Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Informatics Engineering, or a related field with data processing.; 2+ years of professional experience as a Data Engineer or similar role, with a focus on data warehousing, data pipelining, modeling, and transformation.; Proficiency in Python and SQL for data extraction, transformation, and analysis.; Proficiency in Tableau Desktop and Tableau Server, including advanced knowledge of dashboard development, data blending, calculated fields, parameters, and filters.; Experience with application orchestration, Docker and Kubernetes; Strong understanding of data warehousing concepts, methodologies, and best practices.; Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud Platform for deploying and managing data pipelines; Experience with cloud data warehouses such as: Google BigQuery and Snowflake.; Understand with data modelling techniques including dimensional modelling, star schema design, and slowly changing dimension (SCD).; Have knowledge of ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes and tools to efficiently extract data from various sources, transform it, and load it into the data warehouse.; Familiarity with data quality assurance techniques and tools to ensure data accuracy, consistency, and completeness.; Ability to collaborate effectively with business and technical counterparts to understand requirements and translate them into technical solutions.; Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.; Excellent communication and documentation skills to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.; Ability to work independently and in a team-oriented environment, managing multiple tasks and priorities effectively

We are seeking a Data Engineering Intern to join our data team and support the development and maintenance of data pipelines, infrastructure, and tooling. This role is ideal for someone who enjoys working with backend systems and wants to gain hands-on experience in building data systems that power analytics and business decisions.; About Flip; Rafi, Luqman, and Anjar, who were college friends in Universitas Indonesia, started Flip as a project in 2015 to transfer payments to each other at a fraction of what banks would charge them. They are pioneers in the Indonesian market, with their technology now helping millions of Indonesians, both individuals and businesses, carry out bank-to-bank money transfers through a reliable and seamless app.; After nine years of operations, Flip has helped Indonesians transfer money worth several trillions of rupiah and has received double-digit funding from respectable investors such as Sequoia India, Insight Partner, and Insignia. Flip’s ultimate mission is to give Indonesians access to one of the most progressive and fairest financial services in the world.; At Flip, we always strive to provide the fairest place for you to work, learn, and grow with talented and fun people in various opportunities to advance your career and get fair rewards. We believe that we have to treat employees, customers, and all stakeholders fairly and respectfully. Fair treatment for employees means we establish clear goals, facilitate our employees to achieve them, and value their contribution to the company with equitable benefits.; What You’ll Do; Assist in developing and maintaining ETL pipelines to process and transform data; Support data quality checks and monitoring efforts; Help integrate new data sources into our data warehouse; Collaborate with data engineers and analysts to optimize data models and workflows; Work with modern data tools such as dbt, Airflow, BigQuery, or similar platforms; What We’re Looking For; Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or a related field; Familiarity with SQL and at least one programming language (e.g., Python, Java); Understanding of data structures, APIs, or databases is a plus; Interest in cloud platforms like GCP, AWS, or Azure; A problem-solving attitude and desire to build scalable data solutions

At AIA we’ve started an exciting movement to create a healthier, more sustainable future for everyone.; As pioneering innovators for over 100 years, we’re now transforming our organisation to be faster, simpler and more connected. Because we want to be even better equipped to develop digital solutions and experiences that help more people live Healthier, Longer, Better Lives.; To get there, we need people with tech/digital/analytics expertise and passion to help develop positive, sustainable change through digitally enhanced experiences that will impact the lives of millions of people and create a healthier future for everyone.; If you believe in developing a better tomorrow, read on. ; About the Role; Responsible to ensure that the business strategy is supported by robust technology system architecture. This role involves identifying and implementing applicable technical standards for projects, as well as analyzing all non-functional requirements, including security, performance, maintainability, scalability, usability, and reliability. This role will ensure that subsequent product engineering adheres to these standards.; Primarily working on Core Data Design, Structure & Definition for all Enterprise Solution; Conducts a system architecture evaluation and collaborates with project management and IT development teams to improve the architecture; Evaluates project constraints to find alternatives, alleviate risks, and perform process re-engineering if required; Analyzes the business impact that certain technical choices may have on a client’s business processes; Supervises and guides development teams; Continuously researches emerging technologies and proposes changes to the existing architecture; Conduct independent research, interpret highly technical documents, draw valid conclusions, develop technological solutions, take appropriate actions and/or make appropriate recommendation related to complex IT problems.; Build a career with us as we help our customers and the community live Healthier, Longer, Better Lives.; You must provide all requested information, including Personal Data, to be considered for this career opportunity. Failure to provide such information may influence the processing and outcome of your application. You are responsible for ensuring that the information you submit is accurate and up-to-date.

Job Description; Design, develop, and manage data pipelines from various sources to data warehouses and MDM platforms using tools like Informatica and SSIS.; Build and maintain complex workflows, mappings, data quality rules, and transformation logic.; Develop solutions based on detailed user requirements and ensure successful testing, implementation, and documentation.; Troubleshoot and resolve data issues across pipelines and systems.; Generate automated reports and manage data transfers via Shell Scripts and FTP.; Modify and optimize existing logic in ETL processes, PL/SQL, and shell scripts.; Act as technical support in project teams, collaborating with internal and third-party stakeholders.; Document all project work, including data models, mappings, and technical solutions.; Participate in strategic planning and help improve data engineering standards and procedures.; Minimum Qualifications; Required:; Strong experience with Informatica MDM (Hub, Data Director, Admin, Provisioning, Developer Tools).; Solid knowledge of ETL/ELT design and development, particularly using Informatica or SSIS.; Proficient in SQL, Oracle PL/SQL, and working with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL).; Hands-on experience with Shell scripting and generating automated reports to FTP.; Familiarity with API-based data integration and understanding of SDLC practices.; Ability to gather user requirements and turn them into technical solutions.; Preferred:; Experience with BI Tools such as Power BI, Tableau, or Qlik Sense.; Knowledge of data modeling (ERD, star schema) and experience building mock-ups or prototypes.; Detail-oriented with strong analytical and documentation skills.; Proficiency in MS Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).; Team player with strong communication and problem-solving skills.

Kualifikasi :; Minimal bergelar S1 dari jurusan IT; Pengalaman minimal 2 tahun sebagai Data Engineer; Menguasai ETL tools (SSIS/Pentaho/dsb.); Menguasai BI tools (Power BI/Tableau); Berpengalaman sebagai Data Engineer di perusahaan asuransi menjadi nilai plus; Tanggung jawab :; Mengumpulkan data dari berbagai macan source seperti dari MySql, SQL Server, Excel dan datasource lainnya; Mengolah data, membersihkan data kotor, serta mampu mencari anomali dengan menggunakan sistem ETL; Mengembangkan serta merancang arsitektur dari datawarehouse yang telah berhasil dianalisa; Melaksanakan semua tugas sesuai dengan prosedur dan kebijakan Perusahaan

About EY:; EY, a global leader operating in more than 150 countries delivers unparalleled service in Consulting and assists clients to transform and upskill their capabilities.; We serve our clients to build a better working world, helping them to create long-term value for people and society and build trust in the capital markets. That starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities, and creative freedom to make things better. Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime. And with a commitment to hiring and developing the most passionate people, we work towards our ambition to be the best employer.; At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture, and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.; The exceptional EY experience. It’s yours to build.; We look forward you to joining us in the Data & Analytics Consultant team: ; For Managerial level: ; Years of experience: 6-10 solid years of Data engineering and architecture background; Experience:; Design the Logical Data Model based on technical specification requirement; Design ETL logic to transform raw data from source into target table as per the Logical Data Model; Design big data ingestion, loading, and unloading data into a data lake.; Automate data quality error resolution and enforce rules; Prepared test cases and test plan based on the Logical Data Model, Data Mapping and technical specification; Technical skill:; Proficient in data management, database design, ETL design, optimization and development; Proficient in BI development and visualization (optional); Tools:; Packaged ETL tools, i.e. Talend, HIVE and Hadoop, MapR platform; Any database and ETL tools; Cloud architecture; For Senior level:; Years of experience: 3-5 solid years of Data engineering background; Experience:; Translate and develop Physical data model design of transactional and master tables; Data cleansing and data profiling (basic); Develop big data ETL jobs, loading, and unloading data into a data lake.; Implement the delivery of enhancements for an existing Data Warehouse for a new data source system; ETL Unit testing and data validation; Technical skill:; Proficient in data management, database design, ETL design, optimization and development; Proficient in BI development and visualization (optional); Tools:; Packaged ETL tools, i.e. Talend, HIVE and Hadoop, MapR platform; Any database and ETL tools; Cloud architecture; The opportunity:; You will help our clients navigate the business and technology transformation vision. We’ll look to you to provide our clients with a unique business and technology perspective on how technology can transform and improve their entire organization – starting with key business issues they face. This is a high-growth, high-visibility area with plenty of opportunities to enhance your skill set and build your career.; Your key responsibilities:; You’ll spend most of your time working with a wide variety of clients and your colleagues to deliver the latest trends, practices, technologies, and architecture to design, build and maintain scalable and robust solutions that unify, enrich, collaborate and deliver value.; Skills and attributes for success:; Outstanding team player; High level of motivation; Strong work ethic; Self-starting attitude; Independent and able to manage and prioritize workload; Ability to quickly and positively adapt to change; Excellent written and verbal communication, presentation, client service, and technical writing skills, coupled with excellent executive presence.; Significant experience in managing and delivering medium to large teams on complex programs and projects.; Assessing, designing, architecting, and developing solutions leveraging the latest technologies and trends to exceed the business requirements; Unifying, enriching, and delivering value to derive insights and opportunities; Leveraging in-house and partners - platforms and solutions as needed and recommending and building new platforms/solutions as required to exceed business requirements; Communicating findings, recommendations, and opportunities to improve platforms and solutions; Demonstrating a deep understanding of technology, concepts, tools, features, functions, and benefits of different approaches; Seeking out information to learn about emerging methodologies and technologies; Clarifying problems by driving to understand the true issue; Looking for opportunities for improving methods and outcomes; Collaborating, influencing, and building consensus through constructive relationships and effective listening; Solving problems by incorporating data into decision making; Proven track record of sales and delivery in a consulting context with established client relationships and experience; Ideally, you must have a:; Bachelor’s Degree or above in Information Systems, Computer Science, Electronics and Communications, or related disciplines.; Minimum three (3) years of experience (for Senior level) and 5 to 7 years for Manager or Senior Manager level.; The Business Intelligence and Data Analytics team plays a critical role in conducting close-loop data-driven business iterations. As business intelligence specialists and data analysts, our scope of work is not limited to just performance monitoring and reporting, but also in proactively finding actionable insights to help drive high-impact business changes. Our end-to-end data solution reduces the gap between the business teams and technical teams, and achieves real ‘intelligence’ in the iteration cycle. Browse our Business Intelligence and Data Analytics team openings to see how you can make an impact with us.; Job Description:; Work closely with Data PM, Business Intelligence Analyst & other Engineers to turn data into information that can be used to make sound business decisions; Design and develop data marts and data warehouses that support business intelligence and data analytics initiatives.; Develop and implement best practices for data management, including data quality, data security, and data privacy.; Handle end to end data pipelines from multiple sources internally and externally and ensure its performance & scalability as Single Source of Truth; Adhere to software development best practices, including test-driven development.; Requirements:; Master's or bachelor degree in Computer Science/ Information Systems or any related fields; Expert in SQL, Spark, HDFS, and other data processing tools; Expert in Object Oriented & Functional Programming (preferably Python / Scala); Experience in UNIX environment; Proficient in data modeling concepts (preferably Kimball’s versions), batch processing and lambda architecture; Proficient in Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) including code version control, test driven development and technical documentation; Excellent communication & collaboration skills; Analytical & data driven and have high curiosity with data; Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment

Job Description; Design and develop data integration pipelining; Design data modelling for storing the data; Collaborate with stakeholders to design data models and pipelines; Manage the infrastructure behind the pipelines and data storages; Monitor and troubleshoot data pipelines; Minimum Qualifications; Requirement:; Fresh graduate whose tech savvy and enthusiast with data are welcome to apply; Fast learner and independent; Experienced in Python and SQL; Experienced in creating data pipelines; Experienced in data modelling; Familiarity with cloud platform such as AWS and GCP; Familiarity with git versioning tool; Familiarity with Apache Airflow is a plus; Familiarity with docker and kubernetes is a plus; Familiarity with web crawling tools is a plus

About EY:; EY, a global leader operating in more than 150 countries delivers unparalleled service in Consulting and assists clients to transform and upskill their capabilities.; We serve our clients to build a better working world, helping them to create long-term value for people and society and build trust in the capital markets. That starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities, and creative freedom to make things better. Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime. And with a commitment to hiring and developing the most passionate people, we work towards our ambition to be the best employer.; At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture, and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.; The exceptional EY experience. We’ll look to you to provide our clients with a unique business and technology perspective on how technology can transform and improve their entire organization – starting with key business issues they face.
